content: The USA's 'Genesis Mission' is a national AI science program designed to centralize federal datasets, train scientific foundation models, and build a closed-loop AI experimentation platform using Department of Energy (DOE) supercomputers.
Amazon has committed up to $50 billion to expand its AWS supercomputing capacity for both classified and unclassified government AI work.
Meta is considering installing Google's Tensor Processing Units (TPUs) due to increasing chip competition with NVIDIA.
OpenAI CEO Sam Altman hinted at a consumer AI device focused on total contextual awareness, potentially launching within two years, though specific features remain vague.
